title: Confidence interval for proportion of name on USB

content.prompt: A random sample of 300 students is selected from a large group of students who use a computer-equipped classroom on a regular basis. Occasionally, students leave their USB drive in a computer. Of the 300 students questioned, 180 said that they write their name on their USB drive. Which of the following is a 98 percent confidence interval for the proportion of all students using the classroom who write their name on their USB drive?

choices.label: 0.4 ± 2.33 ( 0.4 ) ( 0.6 ) 300 MathType@MTEF@5@5@@49BF@

0.4 ± 1.96 ( 0.4 ) ( 0.6 ) 300 MathType@MTEF@5@5@@49C7@

0.6 ± 2.33 ( 0.6 ) ( 0.4 ) 300 MathType@MTEF@5@5@@49C1@

0.6 ± 1.96 ( 0.6 ) ( 0.4 ) 300 MathType@MTEF@5@5@@49C9@

0.6 ± 2.05 ( 0.6 ) ( 0.4 ) 300 MathType@MTEF@5@5@@49C0@

topic.text: 6.2: Constructing a Confidence Interval for a Population Proportion

skill.text: Skill 3.D: Construct a confidence interval, provided conditions for inference are met.
